name: Opposite Attraction
description:
A GMTK 2021 game jam project made by crypticC0der and Seven

A small game about two magnets who have been seperated and want to become joined together again. Using their magnetism to traverse through some obstacles will be tricky and you need to use both reaction and thinking to proceed until the end. For GameJam2021, with the prompt "Joined Together", the focus was on creating a situation where the aim was to join two objects together. Magnets seemed like an appropriate idea for the goal.
